name: Ancient Treasure 法爾斯編年史：上古秘寶
description: Falsus Chronicle: Ancient Treasure is a dungeon exploring, Anime style action RPG with Roguelike elements. In this game, dungeon will randomly generate traps, monsters and loots. With our unique “Monster Gem” system, every different choice of classes, weapons, and skill sets effects characters raising multiple possibilities, to fulfil...
minimum_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 2 GB available space
